com.ibm.team.process.client

Interface IAccessGroupClientService


  • public interface IAccessGroupClientService
    Client library which provides the functionality to work with Access Groups.

    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IAccessGroup getAccessGroupForGroupContextId(UUID groupContextId, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Returns the access group associated with the specified group context id.
      IAccessGroup[] getAccessGroups(java.lang.String filter, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Returns all available (not archived or private) Access Groups in this repository, whose name match the given filter (if it is not null or empty).
      IAccessGroup save(IAccessGroup accessGroup, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Saves the given Access Group in the repository.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessGroups

        IAccessGroup[] getAccessGroups(java.lang.String filter,
                             org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                               throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns all available (not archived or private) Access Groups in this repository, whose name match the given filter (if it is not null or empty).
        Parameters:
        filter - String to filter groups by name with, no filter is used if null or empty
        monitor - the monitor
        Returns:
        array of Access Groups
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong

      • getAccessGroupForGroupContextId

        IAccessGroup getAccessGroupForGroupContextId(UUID groupContextId,
                                           org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                             throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns the access group associated with the specified group context id. The specified group context id should be a value returned from IAccessGroup.getGroupContextId();
        Parameters:
        groupContextId - the group context id for the access group of interest.
        monitor - the progress monitor
        Returns:
        the access group associated with the specified group context id or null
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • save

        IAccessGroup save(IAccessGroup accessGroup,
                org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                  throws TeamRepositoryException
        Saves the given Access Group in the repository.
        Parameters:
        accessGroup - the Access Group to save.
        monitor - the progress monitor
        Returns:
        the latest state of the Access Group after it is saved
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong
